nodes.text: Zeeba was a male Rodian bounty hunter who competed to participated in the Great Hunt during the Cold War. Zeeba was one of a dozen hunters who competed for the last spot in the Great Hunt, and he succeeded in acquiring the three bounties he was assigned in order to advance. He competed in the Grand Melee against several other hunter, but was slain in the fighting. He wore a yellow jacket and black pants and used two blaster pistols in combat.
